title: Cannot enable OEM unlock on my Sprint Pixel 3a
content: So, I have a Pixel 3a from Sprint. It is payed for each month along with the data/service bill. Now, I really want to root my phone. So, I went to the developer options in settings, and went to OEM unlock. The option is grayed out with a message saying that OEM unlocking is "Unavailable on carrier-locked devices". Does anyone know a way around this?
